response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's intrinsic value and the opportunity to secure such an extraordinary item at a favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your business or personal pursuits with our product.", "product_price": 950000}
